last_episode_to_air.name: Target: Consortium
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jungle Cat returns to assist the team in their efforts to infiltrate Providence as the Consortium reunites for the first time since the Event.

name: Generator Rex
overview: Generator Rex, an average teenager with the ability to turn his body into amazing machines, helps the secret organization Providence save the world from the nanite threat and dangerous EVO monsters.

episodes.name: Day That Everything Changed
episodes.overview: Rex is a regular teenager, except he has nanites that he can control. He works for Providence to help contain people who have been infected by nanites and are raging out of control.

episodes.name: String Theory
episodes.overview: An Evo infects regular people, building army. Rex must cure the Evo, or Manhattan will be "cleansed."

episodes.name: Beyond the Sea
episodes.overview: Nanite activity is increasing around the world. Rex decides to go to one area for Spring Break. He befriends a lonely young woman with a secret agenda.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: Rex and Noah enter the Zoo. A restricted area on the base. Some personal secrets are revealed.

episodes.name: The Architect
episodes.overview: Rex hides from Providence. He encounters a group of scientists that have created a hidden community. The community doesn't realize what the creator had it mind when he built the community.

episodes.name: Frostbite
episodes.overview: Rex absorbs too many nanites requiring an emergency visit to a secret Providence base to store the excess nanites.

episodes.name: Leader Of The Pack
episodes.overview: Van Kleiss arrives in New York as leader of Abysus, granting him diplomatic immunity, and a meeting at the United Nations.

episodes.name: Breach
episodes.overview: Rex vanishes, and Breach is the only person who knows where he is. As Rex explores his surroundings, Holiday tries to figure out where Breach has him hidden.

episodes.name: Dark Passage
episodes.overview: Rex and company head down to South America to locate a researcher who worked on nanites before the Event. He may also have answers to Rex's past.

episodes.name: The Forgotten
episodes.overview: A Providence team retrieving some valuable data is shot down over Kiev, which has been sealed off from the rest of the world. Rex, Six, and Bobo must enter the dome to retrieve the data, and encounter the inhabitants.

episodes.name: Operation: Wingman
episodes.overview: Rex is pursed by a killer EVO bunny. And his life is further endangered as he attempts to go to Prom.

episodes.name: Rabble
episodes.overview: Rex encounters a group of Evos, and discovers a link to his past. He goes undercover to take down the leader of the group, and learns more about his past, and how it could affect his current life.

episodes.name: The Hunter
episodes.overview: Rex encounters Hunter Cain. A man determined to destroy all Evos, including Rex.

episodes.name: Gravity
episodes.overview: Researchers test a new way to eliminate nanites, but the results are not successful. Zag RS emerges and plans on using the method to destroy all the nanites. Rex must journey to a satellite to rescue Holiday and stop Zag RS.

episodes.name: What Lies Beneath
episodes.overview: Rex receives an urgent call from Circe. Abysus is in danger, and they desperately need Rex's help. Rex, Holiday and Six go to Abysus to find out what's going on. Rex balks when he realizes what will happen if he helps the Pack.

episodes.name: The Swarm
episodes.overview: A swarm of Evo insects that devour metals is causing havoc in Asia.

episodes.name: Basic
episodes.overview: Rex and Noah enter Providence Basic training.

episodes.name: Plague
episodes.overview: An Evo plague is spreading. People are falling asleep. Rex and White Knight are the only one left to stop the plague. They must work together to find the source of the plague.

episodes.name: Promises, Promises
episodes.overview: Rex's birthday and a flashback to how he joined Providence.

episodes.name: Badlands
episodes.overview: Rex, Noah and Bobo become separated from a convoy transporting unstable nanites. A biker gang comes after the nanites.

episodes.name: Payback
episodes.overview: Van Kleiss steals Rex's nanites which powers up Van Kleiss and Rex powerless. Van Kleiss gains new abilities and attacks Providence. Meanwhile Rex tries to get his power back and finds something in his system.

episodes.name: Rampage
episodes.overview: Providece is being rebuilt. Van Kleiss turns Noah into an Evo sending Noah on a rampage throughout the city. Rex chases after his friend while Van Kleiss is free to pursue his real objective.

episodes.name: Waste Land
episodes.overview: Rex and Six attempt to retrieve nuclear material from a research sub. They encounter an underwater colony of Evos.

episodes.name: Lost Weekend
episodes.overview: Knight sends Rex and Jones undercover to a party where the performer are all Evos to determine if there's any threat. Rex's friend, Skwydd, tells him some of the performers are getting threats.

episodes.name: Alliance
episodes.overview: With the dome about to fail, Rex and Bobo go to Kiev to repair the shield. Van Kleiss arrives to form an alliance with Noface.

episodes.name: Robo Bobo
episodes.overview: Bobo is behaving responsibly. This alarms Rex. While others are more accepting of Bobo's change, Rex is determined to find out what happened to his friend. An Evo Bunny is captured, and will soon give birth.

episodes.name: Divide by Six
episodes.overview: Six, and some of his old associates, take Rex to a secluded island. Six hopes Rex can cure his mentor, while his former comrades have a different solution in mind.

episodes.name: Mixed Signals
episodes.overview: In the middle of a battle, Rex suddenly produces new builds. As he's being examined, a mysterious stranger arrives who claims to be Rex's brother - Caesar. He claims to have sent the schematics for the builds.

episodes.name: Outpost
episodes.overview: Rex and Bobo head to Mexico where a local group is freeing Evos caught by Providence. Rex is poisoned and must recapture an Evo to find the cure.

episodes.name: Haunted
episodes.overview: A ghostly cat-like E.V.O. interrupts Rex and Noah's double-date with Claire and Annie at a haunted hotel.

episodes.name: Moonlighting
episodes.overview: A pair of Providence Academy washouts start an Evo Abatement business and convince Rex to work with them part time.

episodes.name: Without a Paddle
episodes.overview: Rex attends Noah's High School to compete in a Table Tennis competition.

episodes.name: Written in Sand
episodes.overview: Trapped in cave, Rex and Van Kleiss form an uneasy alliance to find the source of a storm that's destroying nanites.

episodes.name: Night Falls
episodes.overview: Rex and Caesar visit their Abuela in Mexico. Hunter Cain is back.

episodes.name: Hard Target
episodes.overview: Breach is targeting the girls of Rex's life: Cricket and Circe! Or is she?

episodes.name: A Family Holiday
episodes.overview: A researcher claims to have a cure for incurable Evos. Holiday leaves Providence in an effort to save her sister, but Six is suspicious of this miracle cure.

episodes.name: Exposed
episodes.overview: A news team is given a tour of Providence.

episodes.name: Grounded
episodes.overview: Rex is grounded at Providence. But that doesn't stop him from throwing a party. But an old enemy shows up.

episodes.name: Six Minus Six
episodes.overview: While trying to recover Rex's memories, Six loses his memories, and reverts to his old personality, and his old life.

episodes.name: Lions and Lambs
episodes.overview: Van Kleiss attach's a device to Breach which makes her more dangerous. Rex attempts to get her to switch sides.

episodes.name: Back in Black
episodes.overview: Providence has changed during Rex's time jump. Black Knight is now in charge. Rex does not like the new direction Providence is taking.

episodes.name: Crash and Burn
episodes.overview: Rex meets a teenage biker gang with bikes supercharged by nanites. But the nanites are poisoning the biker gang.

episodes.name: Heroes United
episodes.overview: Ben Tennyson falls through a wormhole and encounters Rex. The two heroes must unite against a foe that can absorb their powers.

episodes.name: Phantom of the Soap Opera
episodes.overview: While visiting Noah at his new job, Rex can't resist checking on his favorite telenovela which is having production issues.

episodes.name: Riddle of the Sphinx
episodes.overview: After Holiday fails to return from Egypt, the team searches for her. They soon find something has survived in the Pyramids. Black Knight makes a startling discovery.

episodes.name: Double Vision
episodes.overview: Rex loses his goggles while fighting a plant Evo. His quest to recover the goggles distracts him from the plant Evo and its sprouts.

episodes.name: Guy vs. Guy
episodes.overview: Rex asks for Bobo's help for a prank war with Noah.

episodes.name: Black and White
episodes.overview: White Knight and his team break into Providence to keep Providence from restarting the Nanite Project that caused the Event. Secrets are revealed, and White Knight tells the team what is at stake.

episodes.name: Deadzone
episodes.overview: Providence tries to bring a civilian. Rex and Noah try to save him. The civilian's ability to disrupt Nantes forces hinders their task.

episodes.name: Assault on Abysus
episodes.overview: Rex and Circe go to Abysus to get a Metananite before Providence can obtain it.

episodes.name: Remote Control
episodes.overview: Rex journeys to Hong Kong to help his friends, and learns that Providence has a new method for controlling Evos.

episodes.name: A Brief History of Time
episodes.overview: Van Kleiss ended up in the past and is being pursued. He struggles to find a way back to his own time.

episodes.name: Mind Games
episodes.overview: Circe escapes Providence and is rescued by Rex. She joins them in their fight, but not all is as it seems.

episodes.name: Hermanos
episodes.overview: Rex finds out that he has inherited a ranch. Rex and his friends must work the ranch to fight a claim by a squatter.

episodes.name: Target: Consortium
episodes.overview: Jungle Cat returns to assist the team in their efforts to infiltrate Providence as the Consortium reunites for the first time since the Event.

episodes.name: Enemies Mine
episodes.overview: Some of Rex's enemies escape from prison seeking revenge.

episodes.name: Rock My World
episodes.overview: Rex provides security for a band that's having issues with an Evo fan.

episodes.name: Endgame (1)
episodes.overview: Providence makes its move against Rex and company to get all the Metananites.

episodes.name: Endgame (2)
episodes.overview: Rex must risk everything on his ultimate build in the final battle with the Consortium.

episodes.name: Rock My World
episodes.overview: Rex becomes a security guard of a music band called the Trendbenders. He has to protect them from an obsessed fan who was angry at the change in the band.
